com.intel.fightclub.dialog.coach.commentary

Class CommentaryAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intel.fightclub.dialog.coach.commentary.CommentaryAdapter

  • @ThreadSafe
public final class CommentaryAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
    This class takes a Comment from the coach engine and unflattens complex objects, adapting to a format expected by CUI.

      • processArdaComment

        @NonNull
public static java.util.List<CoachingCommentaryEvent> processArdaComment(@NonNull
                                                                                  android.content.Context context,
                                                                                  @NonNull
                                                                                  nz.co.pltech.arda.engine.commentary.api.Comment comment,
                                                                                  @NonNull
                                                                                  com.intel.ndg.sdi.cap.dlg.common.utils.UnitSystem unitSystem)
        Processes a Comment as provided by ARDA, generating one or more CoachingCommentaryEvent instances to be presented to the user.
        Parameters:
        context - App context.
        comment - an ARDA commentary
        unitSystem - the preferred unit system
        Returns:
        A list containing zero, one or more coaching commentary events to be presented to the user.

      • flattenPlannedRepetitionsFromPlannedPhases

        @Deprecated
 @NonNull
public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> flattenPlannedRepetitionsFromPlannedPhases(@Nullable
                                                                                                                                java.util.List<? extends nz.co.pltech.arda.plan.api.PlannedPhase> phases)
                                                                                                                         throws ArdaCommentaryAdapterException
        Deprecated. 
        Flattens repetitions in a planned phase list into a map containing entries. All training types returned are prescribed training types.

        PlannedPhasesList is being deprecated, so this method will need to be removed in the next ARDA integration. Any usages of it should be replaced by flattenPlannedRepetitions(java.util.List<? extends nz.co.pltech.arda.plan.api.ExpectedTraining>). See FCLUB-18551
        Parameters:
        phases - a list of planned phases.
        Returns:
        a Map
        Throws:
        ArdaCommentaryAdapterException - if there is a problem getting the descriptors.

      • flattenPlannedRepetitions

        @NonNull
public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> flattenPlannedRepetitions(@Nullable
                                                                                                  java.util.List<? extends nz.co.pltech.arda.plan.api.ExpectedTraining> expectedTrainings)
                                                                                           throws ArdaCommentaryAdapterException
        Flattens repetitions in a planned phase list into a map containing entries. All training types returned are prescribed training types.
        Parameters:
        expectedTrainings - a list of expected trainings (formerly planned phases).
        Returns:
        a Map
        Throws:
        ArdaCommentaryAdapterException - if there is a problem getting the descriptors.
